meanings: (무릎을) kneel (down), fall[drop, sink] to one's knees, (기도하기 위해) (formal) genuflect

vlive.korean: 무릎 꿇고! On his knees! 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#378. 열려라 에이티즈 (스페셜 DJ AOA 지민&찬미 with 에이티즈)
애들한테 사과하면 돼? 무릎이라도 꿇을까? Do you want me to apologize to them? Kneel down? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 변태 선생 경찰차에 태우는 법_EP22_[라이크LIKE]
vlive.english: Do you want me to apologize to them? Kneel down?

vlive.korean: 거의 무릎을 꿇었어요 - 로빈아, 협박당한 거 아니지? almost. - ROBIN, you weren't threatened, were you? 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : 🌏 보고싶어서 왔클! 4인실 + 2인실 🌏
vlive.english: almost. - ROBIN, you weren't threatened, were you?

vlive.korean: [하... 트러플 오일도 무릎 꿇었다는 단 하나뿐인 기름 정윤호 온리유...] [Whew... Even truffle oil doesn't stand a chance against Yoon Ho...] View video V PICK! : [ATEEZ] 울 요정들 입 벌려!! 사랑 들어간다🧡＼(´∇｀)ノ (Yunho&WooYoung eating tteokguk&ice cream)
vlive.english: [Whew... Even truffle oil doesn't stand a chance against Yoon Ho...]

vlive.korean: 무릎 꿇고... Kneel down then. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [9966] 마마무 브이앱 보러 고고베베

examples.korean: The town succumbed after a short siege. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 소도시는 짧은 포위 공격 후에 무릎을 꿇었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The town succumbed after a short siege. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She slumped to her knees. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 털썩 무릎을 꿇었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She slumped to her knees. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She knelt in supplication. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 탄원하며 무릎을 꿇었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She knelt in supplication. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They knelt before the throne. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 왕좌 앞에 무릎을 꿇었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They knelt before the throne. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He knelt down on the hassocked hall. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 방석이 깔린 전당에 무릎을 꿇었다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: He knelt down on the hassocked hall. Add to Wordbook
